org.libav

Interface IMediaDecoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMediaDecoder

    public interface IMediaDecoder
    Media decoder interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the media decoder, all its associated stream decoders and the underlaying media reader.
      void flush()
      Flush all underlaying decoders.
      IDecoderFactory getAudioDecoderFactory()
      Get factory for audio stream decoders.
      IDecoder getAudioStreamDecoder(int audioStreamIndex)
      Get decoder for the audio stream at the given index.
      IMediaReader getMediaReader()
      Get underlaying media reader.
      IDecoderFactory getVideoDecoderFactory()
      Get factory for video stream decoders.
      IDecoder getVideoStreamDecoder(int videoStreamIndex)
      Get decoder for the video stream at the given index.
      boolean isAudioStreamDecodingEnabled(int audioStreamIndex)
      Check whether decoding of an audio stream is enabled.
      boolean isClosed()
      Check whether the media decoder is closed or not.
      boolean isVideoStreamDecodingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex)
      Check whether decoding of a video stream is enabled.
      void setAudioDecoderFactory(IDecoderFactory factory)
      Set factory for audio stream decoders.
      void setAudioStreamDecodingEnabled(int audioStreamIndex, boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable decoding of an audio stream.
      void setVideoDecoderFactory(IDecoderFactory factory)
      Set factory for video stream decoders.
      void setVideoStreamDecodingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex, boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable decoding of a video stream.

      • getMediaReader

        IMediaReader getMediaReader()
        Get underlaying media reader.
        Returns:
        media reader

      • isAudioStreamDecodingEnabled

        boolean isAudioStreamDecodingEnabled(int audioStreamIndex)
                                     throws LibavException
        Check whether decoding of an audio stream is enabled.
        Parameters:
        audioStreamIndex - an audio stream index
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled, false otherwise
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the decoding state cannot be checked

      • setAudioStreamDecodingEnabled

        void setAudioStreamDecodingEnabled(int audioStreamIndex,
                                 boolean enabled)
                                   throws LibavException
        Enable or disable decoding of an audio stream. The decoding is disabled by default for all audio streams. You have to enable it at first if you want to get audio frames.
        Parameters:
        audioStreamIndex - an audio stream index
        enabled - true to enable decoding, false to disable it
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the decoding cannot be enabled

      • getAudioStreamDecoder

        IDecoder getAudioStreamDecoder(int audioStreamIndex)
                               throws LibavException
        Get decoder for the audio stream at the given index.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - an audio stream index
        Returns:
        decoder
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • isVideoStreamDecodingEnabled

        boolean isVideoStreamDecodingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex)
                                     throws LibavException
        Check whether decoding of a video stream is enabled.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        Returns:
        true if it is enabled, false otherwise
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the decoding state cannot be checked

      • setVideoStreamDecodingEnabled

        void setVideoStreamDecodingEnabled(int videoStreamIndex,
                                 boolean enabled)
                                   throws LibavException
        Enable or disable decoding of a video stream. The decoding is disabled by default for all video streams. You have to enable it at first if you want to get video frames.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        enabled - true to enable decoding, false to disable it
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the decoding cannot be enabled

      • getVideoStreamDecoder

        IDecoder getVideoStreamDecoder(int videoStreamIndex)
                               throws LibavException
        Get decoder for the video stream at the given index.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamIndex - a video stream index
        Returns:
        decoder
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs

      • close

        void close()
           throws LibavException
        Close the media decoder, all its associated stream decoders and the underlaying media reader.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while closing the media decoder

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the media decoder is closed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the media decoder is closed, false otherwise

      • flush

        void flush()
           throws LibavException
        Flush all underlaying decoders.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs
